outputs.output_descr:
The project "Capacity and Social Development" will support the Ministry to be transformed from a Ministry of Social Affairs to a Ministry of Social Development, to be able to play a leading role in improving the livelihood of local communities and vulnerable groups.
The project will focus on 2 main components: MoSA's new mandate to respond to emerging social needs, and capacity development (MoSA staff, NGOs) on social development-related issues and needs.
